name: XRInputSourcesChangeEventInit
description: The XRInputSourcesChangeEventInit dictionary is used to provide options to the XRInputSourcesChangeEvent() constructor in order to set the initial state of the newÂ XRInputSourcesChangeEvent object.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The XRInputSourcesChangeEventInit dictionary is used to provide options to the XRInputSourcesChangeEvent() constructor in order to set the initial state of the newXRInputSourcesChangeEvent object.
